page.title: 15BOYS FAVOURITE GAMES
page.content:
FOOTBALL,RUGBY,SHORT TENNIS,BALL TAG, ROUNDERS,MISS A PUNCH,RED ROVER, CRICKET. { { Red Rover }
Red Rover is a game played with two equal teams .The two sides stand so that they are parallel .Then the first side says "Red Rover, Red Rover we want ", and they choose one of the other team's people.This person then runs over to the other side .If this person breaks through the chain he takes one of this sides players back to his side. If he doesn't break through he has to stay on their side.This goes on until one team runs out of team members.
